testimonials.testimonialText: I was worried about the $500 deposit most companies wanted because my credit isn't perfect. ComparePower found me a no-deposit plan - saved me that upfront cost and got electricity turned on immediately. Huge relief!

Got a disconnect notice and didn't know what to do. ComparePower helped me switch to a new provider with no deposit required. Service never went off - they handled the switch seamlessly. Saved me from a really bad situation.

Just graduated college and my credit history is thin. Every provider wanted a huge deposit. ComparePower found options with no deposit required - I could afford to turn on my electricity without breaking the bank!

I was days away from disconnection. ComparePower's team worked fast - found me a provider who could switch me same-day with no deposit. My lights stayed on and I avoided reconnection fees. Can't thank them enough!

Bad credit from medical bills made it impossible to get electricity without a $600 deposit. ComparePower found me a no-deposit plan that actually had better rates than what I was paying before. Total game-changer!

Facing disconnection after a job loss. ComparePower helped me switch providers before my service got cut off - no deposit, no interruption. They gave me options when I thought I had none. Grateful beyond words.
